title: EnzymeMLDocument

references.title: references
references.description: Contains references to publications, databases and arbitrary links to the web.

created.title: created
created.description: string the EnzymeML document was created.

modified.title: modified
modified.description: string the EnzymeML document was modified.

creators.description: Contains all authors that are part of the experiment.

vessels.description: Contains all vessels that are part of the experiment.

proteins.description: Contains all proteins that are part of the experiment.

complexes.description: Contains all complexes that are part of the experiment.

reactants.description: Contains all reactants that are part of the experiment.

reactions.description: Dictionary mapping from reaction IDs to reaction describing objects.

conditions.description: Conditions under which the reaction was carried out.

measurements.description: Contains measurements that describe outcomes of an experiment.

kinetic_model.description: Contains the kinetic model of the experiment.

description: This is the root object that composes all objects found in an EnzymeML document. It also includes general metadata such as the name of the document, when it was created/modified and references to publications, databases and arbitrary links to the web.

Reactant.title: Reactant

canonical_smiles.title: canonical_smiles
canonical_smiles.description: Canonical Simplified Molecular-Input Line-Entry System (SMILES) encoding of the reactant.

inchikey.title: inchikey
inchikey.description: Hashed International Chemical string (InChIKey) encoding of the reactant.

references.title: references
references.description: Array of references to publications, database entries etc. that describe the reactant.

Reactant.description: This objects describes the reactants that were used or produced in the course of the experiment.

Complex.title: Complex

participants.title: participants
participants.description: Array of IDs the complex contains

Complex.description: This object describes complexes made of reactants and/or proteins that were used or produced in the course of the experiment.

temperature.title: temperature
temperature.description: Numeric value of the temperature of the reaction.

temperature_string.title: temperature_string
temperature_string.description: string of the temperature of the reaction.

Measurement.title: Measurement

group_id.title: group_id
group_id.description: User-defined group ID to signalize relationships between measurements.

Measurement.description: This object describes the result of a measurement, which includes time course data of any type defined in DataTypes. It includes initial concentrations of all species used in a single measurement.

Creator.title: Creator

given_name.title: given_name
given_name.description: Given name of the author or contributor.

family_name.title: family_name
family_name.description: Family name of the author or contributor.

mail.title: mail
mail.description: Email address of the author or contributor.

Creator.description: The creator object contains all information about authors that contributed to the resulting document.

KineticModel.title: KineticModel
KineticModel.description: This object describes a kinetic model that was derived from the experiment.

Protein.title: Protein

sequence.title: sequence
sequence.description: Amino acid sequence of the protein

organism.title: organism
organism.description: Organism the protein was expressed in.

organism_tax_id.title: organism_tax_id
organism_tax_id.description: Taxonomy string of the expression host.

references.title: references
references.description: Array of references to publications, database entries etc. that describe the protein.

Protein.description: This objects describes the proteins that were used or formed over the course of the experiment.

Vessel.title: Vessel

constant.title: constant
constant.description: Whether the volume of the vessel is constant or not.

Vessel.description: This object describes vessels in which the experiment has been carried out. These can include any type of vessel used in biocatalytic experiments.

Reaction.title: Reaction

reversible.title: reversible
reversible.description: Whether the reaction is reversible or irreversible

species.description: List of reaction elements that are part of the reaction.

modifiers.title: modifiers
modifiers.description: List of reaction elements that are not part of the reaction but influence it.

Reaction.description: This object describes a chemical or enzymatic reaction that was investigated in the course of the experiment. All species used within this object need to be part of the data model.
